text: The Chief of the Hellenic Navy General Staff () is the head of the Hellenic Navy General Staff and commander of the Hellenic Navy. The position is customarily held by a three-star flag officer (Vice Admiral). As part of Greece's membership in NATO, from 1967 until 1999 the Chief of the HNGS was also commander of NATO's COMEDEAST. ==List of chiefs== ===Kingdom of Greece=== ===Second Hellenic Republic===
